name: Name
set_email: To set a password, please enter your email
registration_hint_first: I am a building manager / business owner
mine_type: Private user card, can be included in groups such as residential complexes.
business_type: Utility for business or workplace, can be part of a larger structure.
lost_type: Create a utility for pets and items in case they get lost.
going_on_type: Create a utility for online information about an event or occasion.
emergency_type: Group for emergency numbers (roadside assistance, firefighters, ambulance, etc.).
fork_type: Designed to create online price lists and menus.
assistance_type: Designed for equipment and service technical support.
utils_checkbox_txt: This utility is part of a residential complex
utils_checkbox_office_txt: This office is part of a company
network_error: A problem occurred, please check your connection
register_success: Registration successful, please check your email to activate your account
email_already_in_use: Attention, the email address is already in use
utility_error: An error occurred. Please try again
delete_utility:
Attention!
By confirming 'Yes', your utility will be deleted.
You will not be able to recover it, continue?
account_delete:
Attention!
By confirming 'Yes', your account and all associated utilities will be deleted.
You will not be able to recover them, continue?
call_refused: Unable to reach the person. Do you want to send a message?
not_available: The person you are trying to reach is temporarily unavailable, please try again later
wrong_address: Your current location does not match the location of the QR code. Proceeding is not possible
email_recover: Request successfully sent, please check your email
utility_limit: Utility limit reached, visit the shop to expand your account.
referents_limit: Contact persons limit reached, visit the shop to expand your account.
account_disabled: Sorry, your account is temporarily suspended
account_not_active: Sorry, the account is not active. To activate, please check the email we sent during registration
leave_utility: Are you sure you want to leave the utility?
hide_text:
By activating incognito mode, you will become invisible to other users and cannot be added to new utilities.
You will still be visible in existing utilities.
omny_message_tab_subtitle: Attention! Messages will be automatically deleted after 6 days.
insert_address_number:
Indicate street, house number, and city.
Wait for the load and select the location.
pass_hint:
The password must contain at least one
letter and one number
pass_hint_2: The password must be at least 8 characters long
pass_hint_3: The password cannot be the same as the current one
date_error_2: Expiration date is earlier than return date
date_error_3: The year field must be 4 digits
subscriber: The subscriber must be of legal age
wrong_date_selected: The selected date is not valid
app_init_error: Data loading error, please log in again.
omny_qr_private: The account you requested is private. It is not possible to proceed.
private_description: Setting the account to private means only people included in the account can make calls. If the account is public, anyone can call it.
on_description: Setting the account to On means reports can be called at any time, respecting the availability time slots. If the account is set to Off, it will be unreachable.
call_deviation_title: Select the intercoms you do not want to be called from
no_backup_referent_explain: This line does not have a user to divert calls to in case of unavailability and therefore cannot be silenced
success_deviation: Your availabilities have been updated successfully
deviation_message: User unavailable, call diverted to another extension. Do you want to proceed?
